tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to an open redirect due to improper sanitization of the `returnTo` parameter in the `handleLogin` function. This allows an attacker to craft malicious URLs that redirect users to arbitrary domains. The issue is a regression introduced in version 4.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `@auth0/nextjs-auth0` library to the patch version.
vulnerable_to: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect')
